snippet.title: Dragonero The Rise of Draquir -  Date Launch Reveal
snippet.description:
Dragonero is a classic turn-based RPG with a strategic twist that will challenge you: explore dungeons, plan journeys in a open world filled with events, and face dozens of enemies in turn-based combat. Follow the different champion's paths in this vast comic book-style fantasy universe.

The game will be avaible on Steam from 26 September 2024.

Wishlist and follow now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2532770/Dragonero/
